mapper.select: select tmc.*, td.device_code, td.device_model, td.device_id, td.need_inspection, td.need_metering, td.usage_state, th.hospital_id,tdm.dept_id from tb_setup_case as tmc left join tb_device as td on td.setup_case_id = tmc.case_id left join tb_hospital as th on tmc.hospital_id = th.hospital_id left join tb_department as tdm on tmc.dept_id = tdm.dept_id where tmc.case_id = #{caseId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_setup_case ( case_subject, case_remark, case_state, hospital_id, dept_id, expected_time, device_name, device_type, assignee_user_id, setup_time, setup_remark, create_time, creater, modify_time, modifier, setup_begin_time ) values ( #{caseSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, to_timestamp(#{expectedTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{assigneeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, null, #{setupRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, null )
mapper.select: select tur.user_id from tr_user_role as tur inner join tb_role as tr on tur.role_id = tr.role_id where tr.role_name = #{roleName}
select tr.role_name from tr_user_role as tur inner join tb_role as tr on tur.role_id = tr.role_id where tur.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update:
update tb_setup_case
case_remark = #{caseRemark},
case_state = #{caseState},
assignee_user_id = #{assigneeUserId},
setup_time = to_timestamp(#{setupTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
setup_remark = #{setupRemark},
setup_begin_time = to_timestamp(#{setupBeginTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier}
where case_id = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
